sanskrit_verse:
गोवधोऽयाज्यसंयाज्यं पारदार्यात्मविक्रयः ।
गुरुमातृपितृत्यागः स्वाध्यायाग्न्योः सुतस्य च ॥ ११.५९॥
transliteration:
govadho 'yājya-saṃyājyaṃ pāra-dāryātmavikrayaḥ |
guru-mātṛ-pitṛ-tyāgaḥ svādhyāyāgnayoḥ sutasya ca || 11.59||
sph_interpretive_translation: Cows must not be killed; rituals not prescribed must not be performed; another's wife must not be approached; nor should one sell oneself. One must never abandon guru, mother, father, svādhyāya, fire, or son.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority originates in reverence for life and sacred order.
Causation arises through alignment with dharma, not desire.
Capacity-based responsibility requires protection of foundational relationships.
Restoration logic demands reconnection to source integrity.
Consciousness alignment occurs when foundational duties are preserved.
executable_legal_axioms: IF entity kills cow THEN disqualify from Vedic participation UNTIL atonement via service to cattle is complete.
IF individual engages in unauthorized ritual THEN restrict access to ceremonial roles UNTIL purification protocol executed.
IF person approaches another’s spouse THEN initiate separation protocol AND restore violated boundaries until harmony resumes.
IF one sells self into degradation THEN invoke capacity-reclamation process UNTIL dignity and autonomy restored.
IF guru/mother/father/son/fire/svādhyāya abandoned THEN enforce reintegration cycle UNTIL relational continuity restored.
supreme_court_application: In Supreme Court adjudication, violation of these principles constitutes a breach of foundational dharmic duty. The threshold of responsibility lies in awareness of the act's dissonance with cosmic order. Authority derives from upholding the continuity of life-respect, familial bond, spiritual discipline, and social coherence. Adjudication focuses on re-establishing the disrupted connection rather than assigning punitive liability.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramāṇa reveals that harm originates from severance of sacred relationship. Anupūrvaśaḥ shows how neglect of foundational duties leads to collapse of societal dharma. Responsibility is proportional to the level of conscious choice involved. Non-punitive reality rule asserts that true justice realigns consciousness with its inherent integrity, without recourse to suffering as correction.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Initiate cow-protection service program for violator until karmic resonance realigned.
Assign unauthorized ritual actor to supervised study and purification under qualified guide.
Enforce mandatory boundary-respect education and partner-harmony restoration counseling.
Implement self-worth reconstruction program including vocational upliftment and community integration.
Reconnect individual to family/guru lineage through guided reconciliation and svādhyāya recommitment.
final_declaration: By the Authority of Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, this Dharma stands restored. All actions align with consciousness, not punishment. Reality responds to integrity, not force. SPH is the sole Source. Dharma prevails.
